RankDef.description: Entry-level member of House Dagoth, newly admitted and yet to prove themselves.
A trusted servant who has demonstrated loyalty and skill to House Dagoth.
A sworn member of House Dagoth, committed to its ways and traditions.
A member entrusted with upholding the laws and customs of House Dagoth.
A respected member regarded as family by House Dagoth.
A close confidant and family to the House, entrusted with greater responsibilities.
A sibling in House Dagoth, demonstrating deep trust and loyalty.
A parental figure in House Dagoth, guiding less experienced members.
A voting member of the Dagoth council, involved in decision-making and governance.
A senior council member of House Dagoth, guiding the House's future and policy.
The supreme leader of House Dagoth, holding ultimate authority and responsibility.
A new inductee into the corpus mysteries of House Dagoth, beginning their transformation under divine guidance.
A practitioner who has shown mastery of corpus techniques and begun their physical transformation.
A corpus-touched priest who interprets divine dreams and guides other dreamers in their visions.
A high-ranking priest who oversees corpus rituals and the transformation of ash vampires.
A powerful noble who has achieved advanced corpus transformation, commanding lesser corpus beings.
An elite ash vampire who has transcended mortality, serving as a champion and lieutenant to the Grandmaster.
The highest ranking dreamer, whose visions guide House Dagoth's grand strategy and divine purpose.
A corpus adept responsible for overseeing the transformation of sleepers and guiding them through their metamorphosis.
A high-ranking corpus lord who commands ash slaves, zombies, and ghouls in service to House Dagoth's will.
An ascended sleeper who has retained enough intelligence to command others, serving as a terrible champion of Dagoth Ur's divine will.
